pkgmetadata.longdescription: Propagation of Uncertainty // Propagation of uncertainty using higher-order Taylor expansion and Monte Carlo simulation. Calculations of propagated uncertainties are based on matrix calculus including covariance structure according to Arras 1998 doi:10.3929/ethz-a-010113668 (first order), Wang Iyer 2005 doi:10.1088/0026-1394/42/5/011 (second order) and BIPM Supplement 1 (Monte Carlo) doi:10.59161/JCGM101-2008.
